links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (9,0,1,-9)
formula: a(n) = A046530(9^n) = A046631(2n). G.f. ( 1-6*x-6*x^2-21*x^3 ) / ( (x-1)*(9*x-1)*(1+x+x^2) ). - R. J. Mathar, Feb 28 2011If n>=1, a(n) = 9*a(n-1) -6 if n is not a multiple of 3, otherwise a(n) = 9*a(n-1) -20. - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 18 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
